original_title: Uchuu no Kishi Tekkaman Blade: Nagaki Tatakai no Jokyoku
overview: A special premiere clip-show before the series composed of old setting images. Due to tight production schedule and after the final episode of the previous program "Saber Kids", the episode was finally aired 3 weeks prior.
title: Tekkaman Blade: The Prelude to a Long Battle
